attributes.action: Make it illegal to discriminate against the British Armed Forces & their families in the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More & More we read or see of incidents where our troops or their families are the victims of discrimination simply because they belong to the British Armed Forces.I want this abuse made illegal like all hate crimes in the United Kingdom.Being a member of the Armed Forces does not give people or business's the right to abuse or discriminate members of our Armed Forces or their families.This is a hate crime due to the uniform or association of a certain group...The laws are there to protect if you are  gay,an ethnic minority or of a different  religion/culture,even gender!! Protect the men & women representing queen & country. They are not politicians & do the job most of us wouldn't....Show them the respect they deserve.
